comment:
Nose: Bananas and vanilla frosting. Slight toffee/caramel 

Taste: Charred Oak and Ethanol. Long finish that sits in the back of the throat. 

Solid average spirit for the price range. Not offensive but nothing really intricate that would make you come back for more. Easy to drink and sip.

#6196277 for me
"Pecan"
A little water kills it
